nodes.text: The Firestar 10-K was a carbine weapon. Oddly, it was once found in the stomach of a creature known as SteelClaw in the Dead Forest on Kashyyyk. After the Firestar 10-K was found, they went through mass production.
According to Boba Fett, the weapon has a good balance of firepower, accuracy, and weight.
Star Wars Galaxies uses the same 3D model to represent the Firestar 10-K and the Dart carbine.
